scripts.slides:build: mkdir -p docs && rm -f docs/*.html && if [ -d Slides/images ]; then mkdir -p docs/images && cp -R Slides/images/. docs/images/; fi && if [ -x node_modules/.bin/marp ]; then for file in Slides/*.md; do ./node_modules/.bin/marp "$file" --html --allow-local-files -o "docs/$(basename "${file%.md}.html")"; done; else for file in Slides/*.md; do pandoc "$file" -t slidy -s -o "docs/$(basename "${file%.md}.html")"; done; fi
scripts.slides:build:marp: mkdir -p docs && rm -f docs/*.html && if [ -d Slides/images ]; then mkdir -p docs/images && cp -R Slides/images/. docs/images/; fi && for file in Slides/*.md; do npx marp "$file" --html --allow-local-files -o "docs/$(basename "${file%.md}.html")"; done
scripts.slides:build:pandoc: mkdir -p docs && rm -f docs/*.html && if [ -d Slides/images ]; then mkdir -p docs/images && cp -R Slides/images/. docs/images/; fi && for file in Slides/*.md; do pandoc "$file" -t slidy -s -o "docs/$(basename "${file%.md}.html")"; done
